description:
The silver witch.
Canâ€™t burn me now. 
listen, come on settle here 
We all have the right to live 
Donâ€™t we? And to love, donâ€™t forget to love 
Why dwell so far 
Canâ€™t you hear me calling
Your name is part of me now 
distance is a foreign game 
Come let me undress you 
Come stark naked before the light of the sun
For nothing can hide here 
I bare witness to ignoble secrets buried 
The decaying cage of decadence 
And the ones who thought lies could live 
But the truth will out, the rest will wither
Do I sense a voracious need 
To be told
It is your time 
Your.time.to.be.free
And answer, simply, to no one 
Come Dream With Me
What else for us to do whilst the rest of the world natters away 
We are not like them 
Remember 
We could never fit in 
Because itâ€™s too late 
Once everything is revealed 
There is no going back 
This is an ode to the old you that died 
What a great sacrifice 
You are a grande spectacle now
A thousand flames had burnt you 
Burnt away every last complaint 
Itâ€™s too late 
It will never be the same...
I took mercy and slowly undid your shackles whilst you were sleeping 
I hope you donâ€™t mind

Forever Iâ€™m yours 
Oh Great Mystery ðŸŒ¹

Whispers from a survivor of the natural world
